text: There is a link at the top of every Guide that goes to the related endpoint page, if there is one. Look for the `</>` icon (and on endpoint pages, there is a lightbulb icon for the related Guide page)

I don't think I'm going to click on the View Beta Docs button until it drops me on the same page as I was on before. Like if I click it now I would expect to be dropped on the tasks api but the new docs, this isn't the case. It's not very difficult to do either just setup a little redirect rule

Would be a great thing, if <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/cms/hubl/overview|Hubl> would be included in the "Getting started" menu. I mean - it's basically the backbone of quite a lot of things and currently burried in API& Reference/CMS Reference nav and even there it's not the starting point. Instead it's Modules... :thinking_face:
